short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromium extension that places the Twitch Chat below the Video Stream Player when the Twitch window width is thin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to watch Twitch as if you were on your smartphone when you have the browser window on the side of your main monitor to do any other activity while watching your favorite streamer.
